channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国调查船访问马尔代夫可能引发印度洋安全担忧
item.description: A Chinese research ship is set to arrive in the Maldives on Thursday, global ship-tracking data showed, just three months after a similar vessel visited the Indian Ocean and sparked New Delhi's security concerns.翻译:全球船舶跟踪数据显示，一艘中国科考船将于周四抵达马尔代夫，而就在三个月前，一艘类似的船只访问了印度洋并引发了新德里的安全担忧。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国联想第三季度收入增长超出分析师预期
item.description: China's Lenovo Group , the world's largest maker of personal computers, on Thursday reported October-December revenue of $15.72 billion, up 3% from the same period a year earlier.翻译:全球最大的个人电脑制造商中国联想集团周四公布，10月至12月营收为157.2亿美元，同比增长3%。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 菲律宾海岸警卫队称中国有关入侵的说法“不准确”
item.description: A Philippine coast guard official on Thursday described as "inaccurate" its Chinese counterpart's claim that a fisheries vessel "illegally intruded" into Beijing's waters.翻译:周四，一名菲律宾海岸警卫队官员称，中国同行声称一艘渔船“非法侵入”北京海域的说法“不准确”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 五角大楼表示，美国国务院同意向台湾出售军事装备
item.description: The U.S. State Department has approved the potential sale to Taiwan of about $75 million of advanced tactical data link system upgrade planning, the Pentagon said on Wednesday.翻译:五角大楼周三表示，美国国务院已批准向台湾出售价值约 7500 万美元的先进战术数据链系统升级计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达击败日本日经指数创历史新高，亚洲其他地区表现平平
item.description: Japan's Nikkei share average topped its all-time peak on Thursday, after unexpectedly strong revenue forecasts from U.S. chip designer Nvidia lifted Asian tech stocks.翻译:美国芯片设计公司英伟达出人意料地强劲的收入预测提振了亚洲科技股，日本日经指数周四创下历史新高。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 台总统接见美国代表团：希望今年台美交流更多
item.description: Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen told a visiting U.S. delegation of lawmakers on Thursday the island hoped to see more Taiwan-U.S. exchanges this year and Taiwan will continue to engage with the world.翻译:台湾总统蔡英文周四对来访的美国议员代表团表示，台湾希望今年能看到更多台美交流，台湾将继续与世界接触。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美元区间波动，等待一系列PMI数据
item.description: The dollar held broadly steady on Thursday as traders awaited a slew of business activity surveys to gauge the health of major economies and what that may mean for the global interest rate outlook.翻译:周四美元基本保持稳定，交易员正在等待一系列商业活动调查，以评估主要经济体的健康状况及其对全球利率前景的影响。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 中国Z-​​10攻击直升机首次海外亮相，但出口前景不明朗
item.description: China's AVIC displayed its Z-10 attack helicopter for the first time outside its home country at the Singapore Airshow - the only non-Western design on display in a year in which no Russian defence companies were in attendance.翻译:中国航空工业集团公司在新加坡航展上首次在国外展示了Z-10攻击直升机，这是今年没有俄罗斯国防公司参加的唯一一次非西方设计。
item.author: Gerry Doyle

item.title: 外交部长表示，中国认为欧洲对其发展越来越“理性”
item.description: China said it sees Europe as increasingly viewing the country with a "rational perception," and that Europe should "not be afraid of it," Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said.翻译:中国外交部长王毅表示，中国认为欧洲越来越以“理性认知”看待中国，欧洲不应“害怕”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 汇丰成本难题加剧投资者银行审查
item.description: Climbing costs at HSBC have added to growing investor concerns about how big banks manage their expenses, putting executives under pressure to quickly address spending.翻译:汇丰银行成本不断攀升，加剧了投资者对大银行如何管理开支的担忧，使高管面临着迅速解决支出问题的压力。
item.author: Sinead Cruise, Lawrence White

item.title: 中国2023年煤电审批量增加，气候目标面临风险
item.description: China approved another 114 gigawatts (GW) of coal power capacity in 2023, up 10% from a year earlier, with the world's top carbon polluter now at risk of falling short on climate targets after sanctioning dozens of new plants, research showed on Thursday.翻译:周四的研究显示，中国将在 2023 年再批准 114 吉瓦 (GW) 的煤电装机容量，较上年增长 10%，在批准了数十座新电厂后，这个世界最大的碳污染国家现在面临着无法实现气候目标的风险。
item.author: David Stanway

item.title: 美国国会议员中国委员会主席抵达台湾
item.description: U.S. Representative Mike Gallagher, who chairs the House of Representatives select committee on China, arrived in Taiwan on Thursday with a delegation of other lawmakers and will meet Taiwan's president and president-elect.翻译:众议院中国问题特别委员会主席、美国众议员迈克·加拉格尔周四与其他议员组成的代表团抵达台湾，并将会见台湾总统和当选总统。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着中国脱钩加速，台湾芯片公司涌向日本
item.description: Japan's efforts to rebuild its semiconductor industry are getting a shot in the arm as more and more Taiwanese chip companies expand here - not only to support a new TSMC plant but also excited about the Japanese sector's prospects.翻译:随着越来越多的台湾芯片公司在这里扩张，日本重建半导体行业的努力正受到强心剂——不仅是为了支持台积电的新工厂，而且还对日本半导体行业的前景感到兴奋。
item.author: Sam Nussey, Fanny Potkin, Miho Uranaka

item.title: 《红茶》导演告诉柏林电影节，世界存在于以欧洲为中心的视野之外
item.description: For director Abderrahmane Sissako, it was important to show a side of Africa that is not often portrayed on the big screen in his bicontinental tea-obsessed romance "Black Tea," which premiered at the Berlin Film Festival on Wednesday evening.翻译:对于导演阿卜杜勒拉赫曼·西萨科 (Abderrahmane Sissako) 来说，在他的两洲茶迷爱情片《红茶》中展现非洲在大银幕上不常见的一面非常重要，该片于周三晚上在柏林电影节上首映。
item.author: Miranda Murray, Swantje Stein

item.title: 早间竞价：英伟达定下基调
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 第一量子矿业宣布资本重组以减少债务
item.description: First Quantum Minerals on Wednesday announced a series of capital restructuring measures that would strengthen its balance sheet and cut debt, a move that will help the Canadian miner deliver on its "operational objectives."翻译:第一量子矿业周三宣布了一系列资本重组措施，以加强其资产负债表并削减债务，此举将帮助这家加拿大矿业公司实现其“运营目标”。
item.author: Divya Rajagopal

item.title: 罗纳尔多进球，阿尔纳赛尔确认亚冠联赛取得进展
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr advanced to the quarter-finals of the Asian Champions League on Wednesday as the Riyadh-based side beat fellow Saudi Pro League outfit Al-Fayha 2-0 to complete a 3-0 aggregate victory.翻译:克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多 (Cristiano Ronaldo) 的阿尔纳赛尔 (Al-Nassr) 周三晋级亚洲冠军联赛四分之一决赛，这支总部位于利雅得的球队以 2-0 击败沙特职业联赛球队阿尔法哈 (Al-Fayha)，以总比分 3-0 获胜。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 世贸组织推动改革重重障碍
item.description: Days before talks that could decide its future role in setting the rules for global commerce in an era of rising protectionism, the World Trade Organization is snagged on what to do with its "non-meetings".翻译:在贸易保护主义抬头​​的时代，世界贸易组织可能会决定其在制定全球商业规则方面的未来角色，而就在谈判召开前几天，世界贸易组织却陷入了如何处理其“不举行会议”的困境。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 独家：继华为Mate 60 Pro之后，美国瞄准中国顶级芯片制造厂
item.description: The Biden administration is turning up the heat on China's top sanctioned chipmaker by cutting off its most advanced factory from more American imports after it produced a sophisticated chip for Huawei's Mate 60 Pro phone, three people familiar with the matter said.翻译:三名知情人士表示，拜登政府正在加大对中国最大受制裁芯片制造商的压力，在该公司为华为 Mate 60 Pro 手机生产先进芯片后，切断了该公司最先进的工厂从美国进口的产品。
item.author: Alexandra Alper, Karen Freifeld

item.title: 通过库里的收购，中国的京东可能会获得欧洲扩张的捷径
item.description: If JD.com does acquire British electronics retailer Currys , the Chinese ecommerce giant would get the store and warehouse network it needs to expand rapidly in the UK and Europe at a bargain-basement price.翻译:如果京东确实收购了英国电子零售商 Currys，这家中国电子商务巨头将以低廉的价格获得在英国和欧洲快速扩张所需的商店和仓库网络。
item.author: Casey Hall, Sophie Yu, Helen Reid
